body.p:
Hartford Ky
sept 14. 1863.
To his Excelency
Gov Bramlete

I have been called uppon by Mr. Moses Bare. to state the condition of his health. I have known him for the last Eight years, and to my certain knolledge his health has not been good. during the time of my acquaintance with him he is very small. what we call a dwarfe. he is also a forigner and is unacquainted with our Laws until his our last Grand Jury met since that time I believe that he has obeyed the Laws to the letter I will further state that I believe that he was led off by several Houses kept in our town by Native Born cittizins for I know that all our grocerys sold in violation of our Laws and I further state that I am confident that it is the wish of at least 3 fourth of our citizins that his fine should be remited.

Yours in hast,
M J Berry M. D
